formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ZapBarge' =-
[Synopsis] Barge in (monitor) Zap channel
[Description] ZapBarge([channel]): Barges in on a specified zap channel or prompts if one is not specified. Returns -1 when caller user hangs up and is independent of the state of the channel being monitored.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6 ():

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,10 +1,10 @@ - -= Info about application 'ZapBarge' =- + -= Info about application 'DAHDIBarge' =-
[Synopsis] - Barge in (monitor) Zap channel + Barge in (monitor) DAHDI channel
[Description] - ZapBarge([channel]): Barges in on a specified zap + DAHDIBarge([channel]): Barges in on a specified DAHDI channel or prompts if one is not specified. Returns -1 when caller user hangs up and is independent of the state of the channel being monitored.
